edu.cmu.sphinx.jsapi

Class SphinxRecognizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.speech.engine.BaseEngine
      • com.sun.speech.engine.recognition.BaseRecognizer
        • edu.cmu.sphinx.jsapi.SphinxRecognizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpeechEventDispatcher, Engine, Recognizer

    public class SphinxRecognizer
extends BaseRecognizer
    A SphinxRecognizer provides access to Sphinx speech recognition capabilities.

    • Method Detail

      • loadJSGF

        public RuleGrammar loadJSGF(java.io.Reader reader)
                     throws GrammarException,
                            java.io.IOException,
                            EngineStateError
        From javax.speech.recognition.Recognizer. Sphinx4 has different concepts for loading grammars. Since the JSAPI 1.0 way does not work properly, this workaround is needed. It simply adds the rules of the loaded grammar to the existing rules.
        Specified by:
        loadJSGF in interface Recognizer
        Overrides:
        loadJSGF in class BaseRecognizer
        Parameters:
        reader - the Reader containing JSGF input.
        Throws:
        GrammarException
        java.io.IOException
        EngineStateError

      • loadJSGF

        public RuleGrammar loadJSGF(java.net.URL url,
                   java.lang.String name)
                     throws GrammarException,
                            java.io.IOException
        Load a RuleGrammar and its imported grammars from a URL containing JSGF text. From javax.speech.recognition.Recognizer.
        Specified by:
        loadJSGF in interface Recognizer
        Overrides:
        loadJSGF in class BaseRecognizer
        Parameters:
        url - the base URL containing the JSGF grammar file.
        name - the name of the JSGF grammar to load.
        Returns:
        Loaded grammar.
        Throws:
        GrammarException - Error in the grammar.
        java.io.IOException - Error reading the grammar.
